name: Bobby Donut!
description:
Have you ever wanted a game about eating donuts?

Well, I don't care if you haven't, because I got this game, which only took me 10 hours to make. 

...

If you are kind enough to download and play the game (plz, it's free, without ads!), you'll be controlling this cool, fat character: Bobby. You need to satisfy Bobby's hunger by eating all of the donuts of a conveniently located restaurant. 

Btw,

Youtuber @Patrikus Droilius actually made the main theme I put in the game. (I made the menu theme and the other in-game recordings)

Here's the link to the original song:
